summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lumina Search image search application. Backend APIs fully functional after fixing Unsplash title validation and Pixabay redirect issues. Frontend has search functionality working but image rendering inconsistency found.

fixed_issues.issue: Unsplash API returning 0 results due to title field validation error
fixed_issues.fix: Updated title field handling to use fallback chain: description || alt_description || 'Untitled'

fixed_issues.issue: Pixabay API failing with 301 redirect error

ui_bugs.issue: Image cards not rendering consistently after search - shows correct result count but 0 cards displayed for some searches

integration_issues.issue: Frontend shows correct API response count but fails to render image cards consistently
integration_issues.symptoms: Search info shows '60 imagens encontradas' but image grid shows 0 cards

development_environment_issues.issue: Webpack dev server overlay blocking interactions during testing
development_environment_issues.impact: Prevents automated testing of checkbox interactions and some click events

passed_tests: All 3 image APIs (Unsplash, Pexels, Pixabay) returning results correctly
API validation working (empty query, invalid sources)
Frontend page loading and basic UI elements

success_percentage.frontend: 75% - Core functionality working, image rendering issue found

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend image grid rendering issue - search API calls are successful and return correct counts, but ImageGrid component is not consistently displaying image cards. Check React state management in useImageSearch hook and ImageGrid component rendering logic.
